events.message: I received my order last week, but the item is not as described and I would like to request a refund.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the customer being unsatisfied with the product description.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund case to ensure timely resolution.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request and will do my best to assist.
Could you please provide your order number and details about the issue so we can process your refund quickly?
My order number is 12345, and the item was missing parts and did not match the pictures on the website.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We can offer you a full refund or send a replacement immediately. Please let us know your preference.
Thank you for your quick reply. I would prefer a full refund given the condition of the item.
Your refund has been processed and should appear in your bank account within 5-7 business days. We appreciate your understanding.
We are checking in to confirm you have received your refund. Please let us know if you have any further questions or concerns.
Since there has been no further communication, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for contacting our support team.
